title: Disable automatic checkpoints by default in Windows 10 Hyper-V
body: Automatic checkpoints are always ON when creating a new virtual machine on Windows 10 Hyper-V. Idea is to give a user ability to control default behavior in some way permanently via UI. Currently for every newly created VM we have to manually remove that tick "use automatic checkpoints" form the Settings/Management/Checkpoints as it is always ON.
